function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation and infection of Coronavirus impacted by environmental factors such as temperature and humidity.","Impact":"Potential for delayed infection and death in countries with hot and humid climates, contributing to lower infection rates.","Mitigation":"Understanding the environmental factors and their impact on virus stability to inform public health measures and strategies.","Technologies":"Climate monitoring technology, virus stability testing technology.","People":"Population of countries with different climates, public health officials, researchers.","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions, public health organizations."}]}
